body.name: Violet 4-In-1 Convertible Mini Crib In Black, Greenguard Gold Certified, JPMA Certified, 3 Position Mattress Height Settings, Non-Toxic Finish

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Dream On Me Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 9 mins
features: CONVERTIBILITY OPTIONS: The Violet/Piper 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib keeps pace with your growing child. Starting as a mini crib, you can convert it into a mini daybed and twin-size bed (bed rails sold separately)

COMPACT DESIGN: Built of solid pinewood, it boasts a minimalist, flowing design. It occupies a small footprint, making it ideal for compact spaces or when you are co-sharing with your child. Choose from 6 pleasant finishes and design a chic space.Do not use window cleaners or cleaning abrasives

MATTRESS MATTERS: The Violet/Piper has a 3-position adjustable mattress height setting for adaptability. It comes with the regulatory 1” mattress pad. Choose a DOM non-toxic, Greenguard Gold certified mini or portable crib mattress for a perfect fit
PRIORITIZING SAFETY: All our cribs are JPMA certified and are tested for lead and other toxic elements to meet or exceed applicable ASTM safety standards
PRODUCT SPECS: Product dimensions are 42Lx25Wx36H inches. The maximum weight limit is 50 lbs. All tools/assembly instructions included
body.description: The Violet 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib is the perfect nursery solution for small spaces and to keep pace with the changing needs of your growing child. Starting as a mini crib, you can convert it into a mini daybed and twin-size bed (bed rails sold separately).Built of solid pinewood, the Violet attracts with a flowing and curvy design. Minimalist with a small footprint, it is ideal to make the most of small spaces or when you are co-sharing with your baby. You can choose from pleasant non-toxic, water based paint finishes and create a stylish space for your child.The Violet has a 3-position adjustable mattress height setting that you can adjust as your child grows. It comes with the regulatory 1” mattress pad. Choose a Dream On Me non-toxic, Greenguard Gold certified mini or portable crib mattress for a perfect fit. At Dream On Me we prioritize safety. All our cribs are JPMA certified and are tested for lead and other toxic elements to meet/exceed government and ASTM safety standards. Product dimensions are 40L x 25W x 36H inches. Maximum weight limit is 50 lbs. All tools/assembly instructions included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy and cute crib
reviews.reviewText: My daughter pictured is 6 months old and 27 inches long. She fits really well in it for it being a mini crib. I love the dark grey. It’s sparkly so perfect for a little girls room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Measurements were on point. Quality was great. Sturdiness is very stable. Was nervous seeing some reviews about the wood quality and damages HOWEVER ours came perfect. Luckily if there are any dings over time, I’m sure you could easily use a black furniture marker to cover those dings. It was fairly easy to assemble. My husband and 9 year old boy had it built within 35-45 mins and that was with a Euro Great Dane very interested the entire time, meaning in the way. Lol. I’d definitely recommend to anyone with a smaller size nursery like ours. We converted our good size walk in closet to our baby girls nursery and this was the perfect fit for the area we wanted her crib to be in. We have so much room for everything else while she still has a good size bed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: This mini crib was a game changer for us with baby #2! I never put anything together always leave it to my husband & I was able to help with this one and it only took about 45 mins if that. It literally saves so much space and so much room for baby. We got the Espresso color and it’s beautiful. It’s so elegant and the waves add a nice touch. It does come with a small mattress like a pack & play mattress, but we got a mini crib mattress as well for extra comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this crib and the price I paid for it! It was shipped within a week from ordering. It came packaged well and all the screws and tools were there. Only thing is, I really wish they had better visuals of which screws is which. I really struggled with this and had to change out the screws. It took me almost two hours to assemble. Also, I was being too fast and put all four sides on before putting the board in. You need to leave one long side rail open and install the board then put the last side rail on. Now, if you know your measurements (fractions) by heart or have a measuring tape or hand, then you should be good to go at identifying which correct screws to use. I had a measuring tape and still struggled! I couldn't get myself together. I was getting tired. After, looking at the paper for about 15 minutes and looking at the parts, I was like "Ohhhhh, I see! " LOL!! I had to laugh at myself.Lastly, I pre-measured the space and it was supposed to fit good without being to snug. It was pretty snug but I do not care! I'm so overjoyed with my purchase. Oh and please be advised you will need to buy a 3 inch mattress. That little piece of mess they give you is not going to cut it! I know what the package says about not having a mattress over 2 inches but I can't find any mini crib mattress that's 2 inches so, I'm okay with buying one that is three inches.Over all I gave them 4 stars. I think the directions for assembly could have more detailed but everything else I'm satisfied with. I new from reading the reviews that mattress would need to be replace so I'm not counting that in tis review. Great value for your money, from a great name brand! I would most definitely, purchase again from this seller and brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Two inch maximum mattress height
reviews.reviewText: We bought this in December 2019 for my now-ten-month-old. We have an older child who, at over two years old, still slept in a tiny corner of his standard sized crib and still loved his pack n play when we traveled. So we felt confident that a mini crib would work well and was perfect for our smaller nursery.Initially, I was disappointed by the lightweight feel of everything upon unboxing. I had been hoping for something as sturdy feeling as a standard crib. The side rail pieces feel flimsier and lighter than that. But, the mattress support piece is a solid board and adds the necessary weight to make this a safe piece of furniture. There were some areas where the finish wasn’t complete or perfect, along with some scratches, dents, and chips. None was overly noticeable on the “natural” wood finish, and I haven’t noticed them since putting the crib together. This looks beautiful in our space and I’m happy with it overall.HOWEVER! I have one huge complaint. Knowing this was going to be a full-time bed for my baby for hopefully two years, I decided to buy a proper mattress right away. Honestly, the one it came with had all the potential of working fine. It seems really similar to pack n play mattresses, which, as I’ve said, my two-year-old still slept fine on when traveling. But my older son is a terrible sleeper, and I knew if my second baby was having trouble, the first thing I would question was the mattress. And I knew I would spend approximately $1 billion in 2am Amazon purchases hoping to solve my baby’s sleep problems. So, good mattress from the get-go. The problem: nowhere, on Amazon’s product description, Dream On Me’s website, or any other product description I read, did it state that:THERE IS A TWO INCH MAXIMUM HEIGHT FOR ANY MATTRESS USED WITH THIS CRIB.This is clearly stated in huge letters on the outside of the box and is essential information for purchasers! I ordered a five-inch mattress at the same time as the crib and was unable to return it. The reason for this limit is immediately obvious - a taller mattress is unsafe because it raises baby too close to the top of the rails and creates a fall hazard. At first, we were able to simply use a lower setting since the height is adjustable. Now that my daughter is ten months old, the mattress is on its lowest height. As soon as she starts to pull herself to standing (most babies already can at ten months) she will be way too high up on the rails to be safe. Even at 50th percentile height, it’s clear she’ll be too tall.Unfortunately, though my husband is quite handy, I don’t think we will even be able to adapt the crib by drilling new, lower holes to lower the mattress because of how the mattress support board is secured and the location of the joints and additional pre-drilled holes that are only used for the other non-crib configurations (see my photos.) Drilling new holes also is unlikely to work because it’s likely to create a pinch hazard between the top of the mattress and the bottom of the rails, especially since the horizontal rails curve. Not to mention adapting a crib frame is inherently unwise since it’s not safety tested.So, when my baby starts standing any day now, I’ll have to either ditch the nice mattress I bought and put the flimsy one in (my baby is likely to be pretty mad about that since she’s used to a much better standard) or ditch this crib. Super bummer, since both were equally expensive. Definitely avoidable if there had been proper information in the product description.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the crib. Perfect size. Sturdy and actually pretty too . Sadly the pad is paper thin. Bought the thicker mattress and its perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very adjusted For small area
reviews.reviewText: It small and fix right into a bedroom with master bed . Strong and very well put together. Can’t wait for baby to be born to see how he or she looks
